data.information: A most destructive discipline, pyromancy allows a psyker to control and create flame using her mind. These powers focus on combat, from incinerating foes from within to summoning walls of flame to shield allies. Pyromancers are greatly feared, for their powers are often difficult to control once released, and can inflict great collateral damage.

powers.name: Manipulate Flame
powers.effects: The psyker chooses a patch of fire in range and line of sight with a radius no greater than PR metres. Each round, she can either extinguish or control the fire. If she extinguishes the fire, this power ends and the fire goes out. If she controls the fire, she can move it up to a number of metres equal to her psy rating per round along a flammable surface.

powers.name: Spontaneous Combustion
powers.effects: Psychic Bolt; 1d10+2+2*PR E; Pen 0; Special: Flame

powers.name: Cauterise
powers.effects: The psyker chooses herself or another character she can physically touch. If the target is suffering from Blood Loss, successfully using the power removes that condition.

powers.name: Fire Shield
powers.effects: While this power is in effect, any character in range and line of sight that successfully strikes the psyker with an attack immediately suffers Energy damage, with the Flame special quality, equal to the psyker's psy rating. The degrees of success on this attack are equal to those from the Focus Power test, and the inflicted damage is not reduced by Armour or Toughness bonus.

powers.name: Flame Breath
powers.effects: Psychic Barrage; 1d10+2+2*PR E; Pen 0; Special: Flame

powers.name: Fiery Form
powers.effects: While this power is in effect, all of the psyker's melee attacks deal additional Energy damage equal to her psy rating and gain the Flame quality. In addition, at the end of each of the psyker's turns in which she sustains this power, she emits a Psychic Blast (1d10+PR E; Pen 0; Special: Blast (PR), Flame) centred on her location. Each character within the area of the blast, with the exception of the psyker herself, are struck.

powers.name: Molten Beam
powers.effects: Psychic Bolt; 1d10+5+3*PR E; Pen 2*PR; Special: Melta

powers.name: Sunburst
powers.effects: Psychic Storm; 1d10+2+2*PR E; Pen 0; Special: Flame

powers.name: Inferno
powers.effects: Psychic Blast; 2d10+3*PR E; Pen 0; Special: Blast (PR), Flame
